# Data Visualization

This page shows that heavier cars tends to have lower feul efficiency.

```{r echo=FALSE}
plot(mtcars$wt, mtcars$mpg,
     xlab = "Car weight (1000 lbs)",
     ylab = "Miles per gallon (mpg)",
     main = "Heavier cars tend to have lower fuel efficiency")
```
